achievements.title: Who You Gonna Call?
achievements.text: Defeat 13 [[Geist]] or [[Spectral]] enemies. Enemies who are not discarded or added to the victory display do not count.

achievements.title: Savior of Humanity
achievements.text: Rescure every [[Silver Twilight]] enemy who appears in "At Death's Doorstep."

achievements.title: 10/10 Would Read Again
achievements.text: Using the Black Book, take a total of 10 horror with its ability throughout the campaign.

achievements.title: Carl Shmarl
achievements.text: Become part of the Silver Twilight Lodge's Inner Circle, then betray them in "Union and Disillusion."

achievements.title: The Threefold Rule
achievements.text: Join forces with Erynn and turn on her coven in "Union and Disillusion."

achievements.title: New World Order
achievements.text: Help the Silver Twilight Lodge win The Circle Undone campaign.

achievements.title: Immortality Sounds Nice
achievements.text: Help Anette's Coven win The Circle Undone campaign.

achievements.title: More Like Excursion
achievements.text: Complete "In the Clutches of Chaos" without a single incursion occurring.

achievements.title: Case Closed
achievements.text: Save each of the following characters from a terrible fate:

achievements.title: Music of the Outer Gods
achievements.text: Accept your fate and win The Circle Undone campaign by joining the Pipers of Azathoth.

achievements.title: Weaver of Shadow and Mist
achievements.text: Reject your fate and win The Circle Undone campaign by crafting a spell to contain Azathoth.

achievements.title: Fine Print
achievements.text: Win The Circle Undone campaign by signing your name in The Black Book of Azathoth.

achievements.title: duolA sdroW eht kaepS
achievements.text: Win The Circle Undone campaign by discovering and reversing an ancient incantation.

achievements.title: Circle Expertise
achievements.text: Win The Circle Undone campaign on Expert difficulty.
